Hello

item.title: Looking For Spawn / Pk 317 Server
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

Maybe you could have a try at doing this yourself? The ::pickup command generally just does a check like the psuedo code below:

if(player rights == x){ // if player is admin/owner etc
 // run spawn command
}

Then removing that if() check will let anyone spawn, then you have what you want.

Searching “spawn server” gave me lots of results too.

Read full topic
